name: They Come For The Light
description:
How to play:

Control your fly swatter with the arrow keys and press space bar to swat any bug which try to fly in to the fire. Killing bugs is messy and they will leave their blood behind, press the enter key to swap to a cloth to clean it up for some extra points.

To pause press the esc key.

If too many bugs go in to the fire it's game over. Ear money based on how many bugs you will which can be used to upgrade your score multipliers, money multiplier and how many lives your fire has.

Made for the ZenoJam #5 with the theme Light attracts bugs.

Change Log: 

30/05/2022

Fixed some bugs

Added a reset position. If you lose the swatter press R to make it reappear.

Credits:

All assests made by me (8bitSquid) besides the following.

Fire sounds: Fire crackle by PagDev (Opengameart.org)

Forest sounds: Forest Ambience by Tinyworlds (Opengameart.org)

Splat sound: Bird splat by Blender Foundation (Opengameart.org)
